implementation_details.description: Specific implementation details, code examples, and technical specifications for the SVG to Compose ImageVector converter project.

uv_project.pyproject_toml:
[project] name = "svg-to-compose-vector" version = "0.1.0" description = "Convert SVG files to Compose ImageVector Kotlin code" dependencies = [ "click>=8.0.0", "jinja2>=3.0.0", ]
[project.scripts] svg2compose = "src.cli:main"
[build-system] requires = ["hatchling"] build-backend = "hatchling.build"

file.name: ir/color.py
ir/path_node.py
ir/vector_node.py
parser/path_parser.py
parser/color_parser.py
generator/image_vector_generator.py
parser/transform_parser.py
file.description: Complete SVG transform attribute parsing with mathematical matrix operations

file.name: generator/kotlin_builder.py
generator/templates/image_vector.j2

example.name: backing_property
lazy_property
example.template: wrapper_start: "val MyIcons.Home: ImageVector by lazy(LazyThreadSafetyMode.NONE) {\n " wrapper_end: "\n}"

file.name: cli.py

svg_validation.rule: SVG must have valid XML structure
Root element must be svg with width/height or viewBox
Path data must follow SVG path specification
Color values must be valid CSS colors
Transform attributes must be valid transform functions

ir_validation.rule: Color ARGB values must be valid 32-bit integers
Path coordinates must be finite numbers
Transform parameters must be within reasonable ranges
Nested group structure must not exceed reasonable depth

kotlin_validation.rule: Generated code must be syntactically valid Kotlin
All referenced classes must have proper imports
Parameter values must be within Compose API constraints
Generated ImageVector must be renderable without errors
